Name: Scrap Riders
About the game: Scrap Riders is a pixel art adventure game set in a cyberpunk future. Become Rast , a member of the outlaw bikers gang Scrap Riders , make your way through the wastelands and the big metropolis controlled by corporations. Act as a smuggler with caustic humor to survive in this post-apocalyptic world. Fight your way through this 2D beat them up using your fists and guns, but caution: the wastelands are not for the faint of heart. There, violence is always the answer, but will not be enough! Without your wits you won't last long. Talk to the right people, gather clues, and kick bad guys asses!
